variables.body: Software developer with a background in web development. Specializes in utilising various JavaScript front-end frameworks to create web applications, with experience in testing and back-end development.

sections.title: Frontend Developer
list: Develop new features for React time tracking app used by over 5 million people
Collaborate with a 6-person team on designing new user-facing reports features
Navigate and add new state components to React Redux store
Test React components using Jest

sections.title: Full Stack Developer
list: Lead development of image generating React web application to accompany .NET back-end
Managed Google Cloud Hosting and Firebase Authentication for over 1000 users
Worked on implementing new endpoints and functionality in .NET back-end

sections.title: Software Development Co-op
list: Developed a full stack collateral management application used by the world's biggest banks
Dealt with customer issues and solving bugs in legacy C# code
Created unit tests using Specflow and C# backing code
Improved customer facing front-end using React and RxJS

sections.title: Software Development Co-op
list: Pair programmed with experienced engineers to tackle issues in C#, F#, and Ruby
Employed extreme programming practices to futher development of collateral management system
Took part in daily Agile standups and story estimation meetings

sections.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
list: Completed three out of five years
Withdrew with a 3.53 GPA due to financial issues

sections.title: Programming Skills
list: React, NextJS, RxJS, Redux, Jest, and Node.js frameworks
Go, C, C++, and Java experience
MongoDB and MySQL databases
Google Cloud, Jira, Microsoft Azure

sections.title: Languages
list: Polish - Native
English - Fluent
Russian - Conversational

sections.title: Music
list: Proficiency on bass guitar, guitar, and vocals. Experience planning, routing, and booking tours. Participation in over 100 live performances
Ran an amateur music venue for two years in Philadelphia and organised several livestream shows earning over $1000 for charity
Management and PR for Knifepunch Records
Designed flyers for various shows
